required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effect of Skate Skin Extract on Cognitive Function in Adults
clinical_study.official_title: Effect of Skate Skin Extract on Cognitive Function in Adults With Subjective Memory Impairment

brief_summary.textblock: The investigators conduct a randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled study to investigate the effects of Skate Skin extract on cognitive function in adults with subjective memory impairment for 12 weeks.

detailed_description.textblock: Previous animal studies have indicated that Skate Skin extract may have the ability to improve cognitive function. Therefore, the investigators conduct a randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled study to investigate the effects of Skate Skin extract on cognitive function in adults with subjective memory impairment for 12 weeks; the safety of the compound are also evaluate. The Investigators examine chemical and metabolic parameters, and cognitive function at baseline, as well as after 6 and 12 weeks of intervention. One hundred adults were administered either 500 mg of Skate Skin extract or a placebo each day for 12 weeks;

primary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline Mini-Mental State Examination total score at 3 months
primary_outcome.description: Change in Mini-Mental State Examination total score during 3 months

secondary_outcome.measure: Korean instrumental activity of daily living total score
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline Korean instrumental activity of daily living total score at 3 months
secondary_outcome.description: Change in Korean instrumental activity of daily living total score during 3 months

secondary_outcome.measure: Computerized NeuroCognitive Function test total score
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline Computerized NeuroCognitive Function test total score at 3 months
secondary_outcome.description: Change in Computerized NeuroCognitive Function test total score during 3 months

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline brain derived neurotrophic factor level at 3 months
secondary_outcome.description: Change in brain derived neurotrophic factor level during 3 months

arm_group.description: This group takes Skate Skin extract for 12 weeks
This group takes Placebo for 12 weeks

intervention.description: This group takes 500 mg/day Skate Skin extract for 12 weeks
This group takes 500 mg/day Placebo for 12 weeks

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Global Deterioration Scale (GDS) 2 or 3
Exclusion Criteria:
- Abnormal liver or renal function (i.e., serum aminotransferase activity > 3 times of upper limit of reference range and serum creatinine concentrations > 1.2 mg/dL)
- Diabetes (diagnosed clinically or fasting glucose level > 126 mg/dL)
- History of viral hepatitis or cancer
- Uncontrolled hypertension
- History of serious cardiac disease such as angina or myocardial infarction
- History of gastrectomy
- History of medication for psychiatric disease
- Administration of oriental medicine including herbs within the past 4 weeks

facility.name: Integrated Research Institute for Natural Ingredients and Functional Foods
